mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict_type (id, dict_name, dict_type, status, create_by, update_by, remark) values (#{id}, #{dictName}, #{dictType}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{remark}) on duplicate key update dict_name = values(dict_name), dict_type = values(dict_type), status = values(status), update_by = values(update_by), remark = values(remark)
